country-year: People living on less than $1.25 a day
Number of poor people living on under $1.25 per day
Development Initiatives calculations based on World Bank data bank and World Development Indicators
Total population * Percentage of population living in under $1.25 per day
$1.25-a-day extreme poverty line is based on the national poverty lines of the world's 15 poorest countries at 2005 PPP$
